H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H5265.def: = causative action by which humans remove an object from another object into which it had been inserted or attached in a different way

H2583.def: = state in which an individual or group of people dwells at a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H3383.def: = river; ◄ flowing from Mount {L:Hermon<SDBH:חֶרְמֹון>} in a southerly direction through the {L:Sea of Galilee<SDBH:כִּנֶּרֶת>} into the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}

H3405.def: = town; ◄ located northwest of the {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}; territory of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► first town conquered by {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} after they entered {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H6973.def: = process by which humans and deities experience an emotion of strong disapproval and rejection of a person or situation

H4080.def: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons

H3418.def: = green leaves ◄ of a plant or tree; ► eaten by both animals and humans; ≈ associated with weakness and mortality

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H1111.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zippor<SDBH:צִפֹּור>}; ► king of {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}; tried to curse and destroy the Israelites on their way to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H3513.def: = state in which objects have relatively much weight, ≈ which is often associated with slowness, functioning with difficulty, but also with importance, riches, status, etc.

H1109.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Beor<SDBH:בְּעֹור>}, from {L:Pethor<SDBH:פְּתֹור>}; ► a non-Israelite prophet or fortune-teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1111.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zippor<SDBH:צִפֹּור>}; ► king of {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}; tried to curse and destroy the Israelites on their way to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

36.gl: to put in (someone's) mouth > to give (to someone) to speak

H2076.def: = causative action by which humans kill one or more animals, usually for food

H1241.def: = large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H1109.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Beor<SDBH:בְּעֹור>}, from {L:Pethor<SDBH:פְּתֹור>}; ► a non-Israelite prophet or fortune-teller; ≈ the name became a symbol for attempts to deviate Israel from its divinely chosen path

H8269.def: = someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1242.def: = first half of the day, ranging from daybreak until noon; ≈ used figuratively to denote relief after a time of suffering, and associated with good as opposed to evil

H5927.def: = process by which a substance or other object appears to move up by itself

H1120.def: = location; ► along the route of exodus from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H1168.def: = person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
